/*대외협력과제 목록 retrieveOusdCooTssList*/ SELECT distinct z.wbsCd --과제코드 ,z.pkWbsCd --과제코드(PK) ,z.tssCd --과제코드 ,z.tssNm --과제명 , SUBSTRING(z.prjNm,CHARINDEX('.',z.prjNm)+1,LEN(z.prjNm) ) as prjNm ,z.deptName ,z.tssStrtDd --과제기간시작 ,z.tssFnhDd --과제기간종료 ,z.cmplNxStrtDd --과제실적시작 ,z.cmplNxFnhDd --과제실적종료 ,z.tssSt --상태 ,z.tssStNm --상태명 ,z.progressrate --진척율 ,z.frstRgstDt --최종실적등록일 ,z.saUserName --과제리더 ,z.pgsStepCd --진행상태코드(PL:계획, PG:진행, CM:완료, AL: 변경, DC:중단) ,z.pgsStepNm --진행상태명 ,z.tssNosSt --과제차수상태코드(1차년도, 2 차년도, 3 차년도, 4차년도, 5차년도:국책과제) ,z.tssNosStNm --과제차수상태명 ,z.grsEvSt --GRS상태 ,z.myTss ,z.cmplBStrtDd --완료전시작일 ,z.cmplBFnhDd --완료전종료일 ,z.dcacBStrtDd --중단전시작일 ,z.dcacBFnhDd --중단전종료일 ,z.rsstExp /*연구비(원)*/ ,z.rsstExpConvertMil /*연구비(억원)*/ ,z.arslExp /*실적연구비(원)*/ ,z.arslExpConvertMil /*실적연구비(억원)*/ ,z.bizDptCd ,z.prjCd
FROM ( select M.WBS_CD AS wbsCd --과제코드 , M.PK_WBS_CD AS pkWbsCd --과제코드(PK) , M.TSS_CD AS tssCd --과제코드 , M.TSS_NM AS tssNm --과제명 ,case when m.PGS_STEP_CD = 'CM' then isnull(m.PRJ_NM, dbo.fn_getPrjName(m.PRJ_CD)) when m.PGS_STEP_CD = 'DC' then isnull(m.PRJ_NM, dbo.fn_getPrjName(m.PRJ_CD)) else dbo.fn_getPrjName(m.PRJ_CD) end prjNm --소속명(프로젝트명) , ISNULL(M.DEPT_NAME, dbo.fn_getUpperDeptNm(M.DEPT_CODE) ) AS deptName , CASE WHEN M.PGS_STEP_CD != 'AL' THEN M.TSS_STRT_DD ELSE (SELECT TOP 1 X.TSS_STRT_DD FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST X WHERE X.PK_WBS_CD = M.PK_WBS_CD AND X.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG') END AS tssStrtDd --과제기간시작 , CASE WHEN M.PGS_STEP_CD != 'AL' THEN M.TSS_FNH_DD ELSE (SELECT TOP 1 X.TSS_FNH_DD FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST X WHERE X.PK_WBS_CD = M.PK_WBS_CD AND X.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG') END AS tssFnhDd --과제기간종료 , M.CMPL_NX_STRT_DD AS cmplNxStrtDd --과제실적시작 , M.CMPL_NX_FNH_DD AS cmplNxFnhDd --과제실적종료 , M.TSS_ST AS tssSt --상태 , dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('TSS_ST',M.TSS_ST) AS tssStNm --상태명 , '' AS progressrate --진척율 , M.FRST_RGST_DT AS frstRgstDt --최종실적등록일 , ISNULL(dbo.fn_getNameOnTssPgsStep(M.TSS_CD, 'USER', M.SA_SABUN_NEW) , M.SA_SABUN_NAME) AS saUserName --과제리더 , M.PGS_STEP_CD AS pgsStepCd --진행상태코드(PL:계획, PG:진행, CM:완료, AL: 변경, DC:중단) , dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('PGS_STEP_CD',M.PGS_STEP_CD) AS pgsStepNm --진행상태명 , M.TSS_NOS_ST AS tssNosSt --과제차수상태코드(1차년도, 2 차년도, 3 차년도, 4차년도, 5차년도:국책과제) , dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('TSS_NOS_ST',M.TSS_NOS_ST) AS tssNosStNm --과제차수상태명 , (SELECT TOP 1 RTRIM(X.GRS_EV_ST) FROM IRIS_GRS_EV_RSLT_RGST X WHERE X.TSS_CD = M.TSS_CD ORDER BY X.TSS_CD_SN DESC) AS grsEvSt --GRS상태 , CASE WHEN M.TSS_CD IN (SELECT X.TSS_CD FROM IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR X WHERE X.SA_SABUN_NEW = #{_userSabun}) THEN 'Y' when isnull(m.sa_sabun_name, dbo.fn_getSabunName(m.sa_sabun_new)) = #{_userNm} then 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS myTss , M.CMPL_B_STRT_DD AS cmplBStrtDd --완료전시작일 , M.CMPL_B_FNH_DD AS cmplBFnhDd --완료전종료일 , M.DCAC_B_STRT_DD AS dcacBStrtDd --중단전시작일 , M.DCAC_B_FNH_DD AS dcacBFnhDd --중단전종료일 , ISNULL(B.RSST_EXP,0) AS rsstExp /*연구비(원)*/ , ROUND(ISNULL(B.RSST_EXP,0) / convert(float, 100000000), 2) AS rsstExpConvertMil /*연구비(억원)*/ , (ISNULL(C.YY_NOS_CASH1,0) + ISNULL(C.YY_NOS_CASH2,0) + ISNULL(C.YY_NOS_CASH3,0) + ISNULL(C.YY_NOS_CASH4,0)) as arslExp /*실적연구비(원)*/ , round(x.asrlExp / convert(float, 100000000), 3) as arslExpConvertMil --, ROUND((ISNULL(C.YY_NOS_CASH1,0) + ISNULL(C.YY_NOS_CASH2,0) + ISNULL(C.YY_NOS_CASH3,0) + ISNULL(C.YY_NOS_CASH4,0)) / convert(float, 100000000), 2) as arslExpConvertMil /*실적연구비(억원)*/ , M.BIZ_DPT_CD AS bizDptCd , M.prj_cd as prjCd ,g.DROP_YN FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST M /*과제관리마스터*/ left outer join vw_budg_s x on x.wbs_cd = m.wbs_cd LEFT JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST A /*프로젝트연구마스터*/ ON M.PRJ_CD = A.PRJ_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_TSS_OUSD_COO_SMRY B ON B.TSS_CD = M.TSS_CD /*대외협력과제 개요*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_TSS_OUSD_EXP_STOA C ON C.TSS_CD = M.TSS_CD /*대외협력과제 비용*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT DISTINCT TSS_CD, GRS_EV_ST, DROP_YN FROM IRIS_GRS_EV_RSLT_RGST) t) g ON M.TSS_CD = g.TSS_CD
and left(g.TSS_CD, 1) = 'O'
WHERE M.TSS_CD IN (SELECT TSS_CD FROM (SELECT WBS_CD, TSS_CD, STEPRANK , RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY X.WBS_CD ORDER BY X.STEPRANK ASC, TSS_CD DESC) AS OVER_STEP_RANK FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'CM' OR PGS_STEP_CD = 'DC' THEN 1 WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND TSS_ST = '100' THEN 2 WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND (TSS_ST = '101' OR TSS_ST = '102' OR TSS_ST = '301' OR TSS_ST = '302') THEN 3 WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'AL' THEN 4 WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND TSS_ST != '100' THEN 5 WHEN PGS_STEP_CD = 'PL' THEN 6 END AS STEPRANK , TSS_CD, PGS_STEP_CD, TSS_ST, WBS_CD FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST WHERE DEL_YN ='N' AND TSS_SCN_CD = 'O' ) X) Y WHERE OVER_STEP_RANK = 1) AND M.TSS_SCN_CD = 'O' AND M.DEL_YN = 'N' --삭제여부 --AND iif(g.DROP_YN is null or g.DROP_YN='','N',g.DROP_YN)= 'N' OR (g.DROP_YN='Y' AND g.GRS_EV_ST!='P1') ) Z WHERE 1=1
and ( z.wbsCd in (select distinct wbs_cd from IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST a where del_yn ='N' and tss_cd in ( select tss_cd from IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR where sa_sabun_new = #{_userSabun} ) and tss_scn_cd ='O'
union select distinct wbs_cd from IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST a where del_yn ='N' and tss_scn_cd ='O' and sa_sabun_new = #{_userSabun} ) or Z.prjCd in (select prj_cd from iris_prj_rsst_mst where pl_emp_no = #{_userSabun}) )
AND z.bizDptCd IN
#{item}
AND (z.wbsCd LIKE '%'+#{wbsCd}+'%' OR z.pgsStepCd = CASE WHEN #{wbsCd} = 'SEED' THEN 'PL' ELSE 'X' END)
AND z.tssNm LIKE '%'+#{tssNm}+'%'
AND z.saUserName LIKE '%'+#{saUserName}+'%'
AND z.deptName LIKE '%'+#{deptName}+'%'
AND #{tssStrtDd} <= convert(nvarchar(7), z.tssStrtDd )
AND #{tssFnhDd} >= convert(nvarchar(7), z.tssFnhDd )
AND z.tssSt = #{tssSt}
AND z.prjNm LIKE '%'+#{prjNm}+'%'
AND z.pgsStepCd = #{pgsStepCd} --진행상태코드(PL:계획, PG:진행, CM:완료, AL: 변경, DC:중단)
and z.deptName LIKE'%'+#{_userDeptName}+'%'
ORDER BY z.tssStrtDd DESC, z.tssFnhDd DESC

mapper.select: -- retrieveOusdCooTssSmry 대외협력과제 계획 개요 조회 SELECT A.TSS_CD as tssCd /*과제코드*/ , A.OUCM_PLN_TXT as oucmPlnTxt /*목표기술 성과 계획*/ , ISNULL(A.RSST_EXP,0) as rsstExp /*연구비(원)*/ , round(ISNULL(A.RSST_EXP,0) / convert(float, 100000000), 4) as rsstExpConvertMil /*연구비(억원)*/ , RTRIM(A.CNTT_TYPE_CD) as cnttTypeCd /*계약유형코드*/ , RTRIM(A.MONO_CD) as monoCd /*독점권코드*/ , A.RSST_EXP_FNSH_CND as rsstExpFnshCnd /*연구비 지급조건*/ , A.RVW_RSLT_TXT as rvwRsltTxt /*법무팀 검토결과*/ , A.SURR_NCSS_TXT as surrNcssTxt /*연구과제 배경 및 필요성*/ , A.SBC_SMRY_TXT as sbcSmryTxt /*주요 연구개발 내용 요약*/ , A.STTS_TXT as sttsTxt /*지재권 출원현황*/ , A.CTQ_TXT as ctqTxt /*핵심 CTQ/ 품질 수준*/ , A.EFF_SPHE_TXT as effSpheTxt /*파급효과 및 응용분야*/ , A.FNO_PLN_TXT as fnoPlnTxt /*결론 및 향후 계획*/ , A.ALTR_RSON as altrRson /*변경사유*/ , A.ADD_RSON as addRson /*추가사유*/ , A.DCAC_RSON as dcacRson /*중단사유*/ , A.ATTC_FIL_ID as attcFilId /*첨부파일ID*/ , A.ALTR_ATTC_FIL_ID as altrAttcFilId /*변경첨부파일ID*/ , A.CMPL_ATTC_FIL_ID as cmplAttcFilId /*완료첨부파일ID*/ , A.DCAC_ATTC_FIL_ID as dcacAttcFilId /*중단첨부파일ID*/ , dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('CNTT_TYPE_CD', A.CNTT_TYPE_CD) as cnttTypeNm /*계약유형명*/ , dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('COMM_YN_T', A.MONO_CD) as monoNm /*독점권명*/ , A.FRST_RGST_DT AS frstRgstDt --최초등록일시 , A.FRST_RGST_ID AS frstRgstId --최초등록자 , A.LAST_MDFY_DT AS lastMdfyDt --최종수정일시 , A.LAST_MDFY_ID AS lastMdfyId --최종수정자 FROM IRIS_TSS_OUSD_COO_SMRY A /* 대외협력과제개요 */ WHERE A.TSS_CD = #{tssCd}
mapper.insert: -- insertOusdCooTssSmry 개요 신규 INSERT INTO IRIS_TSS_OUSD_COO_SMRY /*대외협력과제개요*/ ( TSS_CD , OUCM_PLN_TXT , RSST_EXP , CNTT_TYPE_CD , MONO_CD , RSST_EXP_FNSH_CND , RVW_RSLT_TXT , SURR_NCSS_TXT , SBC_SMRY_TXT , STTS_TXT , CTQ_TXT , EFF_SPHE_TXT , FNO_PLN_TXT , ALTR_RSON , ADD_RSON , DCAC_RSON , ATTC_FIL_ID , A.ALTR_ATTC_FIL_ID , A.CMPL_ATTC_FIL_ID , A.DCAC_ATTC_FIL_ID , FRST_RGST_DT , FRST_RGST_ID , LAST_MDFY_DT , LAST_MDFY_ID ) VALUES ( #{tssCd} /*과제코드*/ , #{oucmPlnTxt} /*목표기술 성과 계획*/ , CONVERT(numeric(15, 0), CASE WHEN #{rsstExp} = '' THEN '0' ELSE #{rsstExp} END) /*연구비*/ , #{cnttTypeCd} /*계약유형코드*/ , #{monoCd} /*독점권코드*/ , #{rsstExpFnshCnd} /*연구비 지급조건*/ , #{rvwRsltTxt} /*법무팀 검토결과*/ , #{surrNcssTxt} /*연구과제 배경 및 필요성*/ , #{sbcSmryTxt} /*주요 연구개발 내용 요약*/ , #{sttsTxt} /*지재권 출원현황*/ , #{ctqTxt} /*핵심 CTQ/ 품질 수준*/ , #{effSpheTxt} /*파급효과 및 응용분야*/ , #{fnoPlnTxt} /*결o론 및 향후 계획*/ , #{altrRson} /*변경사유*/ , #{addRson} /*추가사유*/ , #{dcacRson} /*중단사유*/ , #{attcFilId} /*첨부파일ID*/ , #{altrAttcFilId} /*변경첨부파일ID*/ , #{cmplAttcFilId} /*완료첨부파일ID*/ , #{dcacAttcFilId} /*중단첨부파일ID*/ , GETDATE() , #{userId} , GETDATE() , #{userId} )

-- insertCopyOusdCooTssSmry 개요 복사 INSERT INTO IRIS_TSS_OUSD_COO_SMRY /*대외협력과제개요*/ ( TSS_CD , OUCM_PLN_TXT , RSST_EXP , CNTT_TYPE_CD , MONO_CD , RSST_EXP_FNSH_CND , RVW_RSLT_TXT , SURR_NCSS_TXT , SBC_SMRY_TXT , STTS_TXT , CTQ_TXT , EFF_SPHE_TXT , FNO_PLN_TXT , ALTR_RSON , ADD_RSON , DCAC_RSON , ATTC_FIL_ID , ALTR_ATTC_FIL_ID , CMPL_ATTC_FIL_ID , DCAC_ATTC_FIL_ID , FRST_RGST_DT , FRST_RGST_ID , LAST_MDFY_DT , LAST_MDFY_ID ) SELECT #{tssCd} , OUCM_PLN_TXT , RSST_EXP , CNTT_TYPE_CD , MONO_CD , RSST_EXP_FNSH_CND , RVW_RSLT_TXT , SURR_NCSS_TXT , SBC_SMRY_TXT , STTS_TXT , CTQ_TXT , EFF_SPHE_TXT , FNO_PLN_TXT , ALTR_RSON , ADD_RSON , DCAC_RSON , CASE WHEN ISNULL(#{attcFilId}, '') = '' THEN ATTC_FIL_ID ELSE #{attcFilId} END , ALTR_ATTC_FIL_ID , CMPL_ATTC_FIL_ID , DCAC_ATTC_FIL_ID , GETDATE() , #{userId} , GETDATE() , #{userId} FROM IRIS_TSS_OUSD_COO_SMRY WHERE TSS_CD = #{pgTssCd}
mapper.update: -- updateOusdCooTssSmry 개요 수정 UPDATE IRIS_TSS_OUSD_COO_SMRY /*대외협력과제개요*/ SET OUCM_PLN_TXT = #{oucmPlnTxt} /*목표기술 성과 계획*/ , RSST_EXP = CONVERT(numeric(15, 0), CASE WHEN #{rsstExp} = '' THEN '0' ELSE #{rsstExp} END) /*연구비*/ , CNTT_TYPE_CD = #{cnttTypeCd} /*계약유형코드*/ , MONO_CD = #{monoCd} /*독점권코드*/ , RSST_EXP_FNSH_CND = #{rsstExpFnshCnd} /*연구비 지급조건*/ , RVW_RSLT_TXT = #{rvwRsltTxt} /*법무팀 검토결과*/ , SURR_NCSS_TXT = #{surrNcssTxt} /*연구과제 배경 및 필요성*/ , SBC_SMRY_TXT = #{sbcSmryTxt} /*주요 연구개발 내용 요약*/ , STTS_TXT = #{sttsTxt} /*지재권 출원현황*/ , CTQ_TXT = #{ctqTxt} /*핵심 CTQ/ 품질 수준*/ , EFF_SPHE_TXT = #{effSpheTxt} /*파급효과 및 응용분야*/ , FNO_PLN_TXT = #{fnoPlnTxt} /*결론 및 향후 계획*/ , ALTR_RSON = #{altrRson} /*변경사유*/ , ADD_RSON = #{addRson} /*추가사유*/ , DCAC_RSON = #{dcacRson} /*중단사유*/ , ATTC_FIL_ID = #{attcFilId} /*첨부파일ID*/ , ALTR_ATTC_FIL_ID = #{altrAttcFilId} /*변경첨부파일ID*/ , CMPL_ATTC_FIL_ID = #{cmplAttcFilId} /*완료첨부파일ID*/ , DCAC_ATTC_FIL_ID = #{dcacAttcFilId} /*중단첨부파일ID*/ , LAST_MDFY_DT = GETDATE() , LAST_MDFY_ID = #{userId} WHERE TSS_CD = #{tssCd}

-- updateOusdCooTssPlnSmry 개요 수정(개요탭) UPDATE IRIS_TSS_OUSD_COO_SMRY /*대외협력과제개요*/ SET OUCM_PLN_TXT = #{oucmPlnTxt} /*목표기술 성과 계획*/ , RSST_EXP = CONVERT(numeric(15, 0), CASE WHEN #{rsstExp} = '' THEN '0' ELSE #{rsstExp} END) /*연구비*/ , CNTT_TYPE_CD = #{cnttTypeCd} /*계약유형코드*/ , MONO_CD = #{monoCd} /*독점권코드*/ , RSST_EXP_FNSH_CND = #{rsstExpFnshCnd} /*연구비 지급조건*/ , RVW_RSLT_TXT = #{rvwRsltTxt} /*법무팀 검토결과*/ , SURR_NCSS_TXT = #{surrNcssTxt} /*연구과제 배경 및 필요성*/ , SBC_SMRY_TXT = #{sbcSmryTxt} /*주요 연구개발 내용 요약*/ , ATTC_FIL_ID = #{attcFilId} /*첨부파일ID*/ , LAST_MDFY_DT = GETDATE() , LAST_MDFY_ID = #{userId} WHERE TSS_CD = #{tssCd}

-- updateOusdCooTssCmplSmry 개요 수정 - 완료 UPDATE IRIS_TSS_OUSD_COO_SMRY /*대외협력과제개요*/ SET SURR_NCSS_TXT = #{surrNcssTxt} /*연구과제 배경 및 필요성*/ , SBC_SMRY_TXT = #{sbcSmryTxt} /*주요 연구개발 내용 요약*/ , STTS_TXT = #{sttsTxt} /*지재권 출원현황*/ , CTQ_TXT = #{ctqTxt} /*핵심 CTQ/ 품질 수준*/ , EFF_SPHE_TXT = #{effSpheTxt} /*파급효과 및 응용분야*/ , FNO_PLN_TXT = #{fnoPlnTxt} /*결론 및 향후 계획*/ , CMPL_ATTC_FIL_ID = #{cmplAttcFilId} /*완료첨부파일ID*/ , LAST_MDFY_DT = GETDATE() , LAST_MDFY_ID = #{userId} WHERE TSS_CD = #{tssCd}

-- updateOusdTssSmryToSelect UPDATE T1 SET t1.OUCM_PLN_TXT = t2.OUCM_PLN_TXT ,t1.RSST_EXP = t2.RSST_EXP ,t1.CNTT_TYPE_CD = t2.CNTT_TYPE_CD ,t1.MONO_CD = t2.MONO_CD ,t1.RSST_EXP_FNSH_CND = t2.RSST_EXP_FNSH_CND ,t1.RVW_RSLT_TXT = t2.RVW_RSLT_TXT ,t1.SURR_NCSS_TXT = t2.SURR_NCSS_TXT ,t1.SBC_SMRY_TXT = t2.SBC_SMRY_TXT ,t1.ATTC_FIL_ID = t2.ATTC_FIL_ID ,t1.LAST_MDFY_DT = GETDATE() ,t1.LAST_MDFY_ID = #{userId} FROM (SELECT OUCM_PLN_TXT ,RSST_EXP ,CNTT_TYPE_CD ,MONO_CD ,RSST_EXP_FNSH_CND ,RVW_RSLT_TXT ,SURR_NCSS_TXT ,SBC_SMRY_TXT ,ATTC_FIL_ID ,LAST_MDFY_DT ,LAST_MDFY_ID FROM IRIS_TSS_OUSD_COO_SMRY WHERE tss_cd = #{psTssCd} ) T1 , IRIS_TSS_OUSD_COO_SMRY T2 WHERE t2.TSS_CD = #{tssCd}
mapper.insert: -- insertOusdCooTssExpStoa 대외협력과제 비용지급 저장 INSERT INTO IRIS_TSS_OUSD_EXP_STOA /*대외협력과제비용지급*/ ( TSS_CD , TTL_CASH , YY_NOS_CASH1 , YY_NOS_DT1 , YY_NOS_CASH2 , YY_NOS_DT2 , YY_NOS_CASH3 , YY_NOS_DT3 , YY_NOS_CASH4 , YY_NOS_DT4 , FRST_RGST_DT , FRST_RGST_ID , LAST_MDFY_DT , LAST_MDFY_ID ) VALUES ( #{tssCd} /*과제코드*/ , (CASE WHEN #{ttlCash} = NULL OR #{ttlCash} = '' THEN NULL ELSE CONVERT(numeric, #{ttlCash}) END) , (CASE WHEN #{yyNosCash1} = NULL OR #{yyNosCash1} = '' THEN NULL ELSE CONVERT(numeric, #{yyNosCash1}) END) , #{yyNosDt1} , (CASE WHEN #{yyNosCash2} = NULL OR #{yyNosCash2} = '' THEN NULL ELSE CONVERT(numeric, #{yyNosCash2}) END) , #{yyNosDt2} , (CASE WHEN #{yyNosCash3} = NULL OR #{yyNosCash3} = '' THEN NULL ELSE CONVERT(numeric, #{yyNosCash3}) END) , #{yyNosDt3} , (CASE WHEN #{yyNosCash4} = NULL OR #{yyNosCash4} = '' THEN NULL ELSE CONVERT(numeric, #{yyNosCash4}) END) , #{yyNosDt4} , GETDATE() , #{userId} , GETDATE() , #{userId} )

-- insertCopyOusdCooTssExpStoa 대외협력과제 비용지급 복사 INSERT INTO IRIS_TSS_OUSD_EXP_STOA /*대외협력과제비용지급*/ ( TSS_CD , TTL_CASH , YY_NOS_CASH1 , YY_NOS_DT1 , YY_NOS_CASH2 , YY_NOS_DT2 , YY_NOS_CASH3 , YY_NOS_DT3 , YY_NOS_CASH4 , YY_NOS_DT4 , FRST_RGST_DT , FRST_RGST_ID , LAST_MDFY_DT , LAST_MDFY_ID ) SELECT #{tssCd} , TTL_CASH , YY_NOS_CASH1 , YY_NOS_DT1 , YY_NOS_CASH2 , YY_NOS_DT2 , YY_NOS_CASH3 , YY_NOS_DT3 , YY_NOS_CASH4 , YY_NOS_DT4 , GETDATE() , #{userId} , GETDATE() , #{userId} FROM IRIS_TSS_OUSD_EXP_STOA WHERE TSS_CD = #{pgTssCd}
mapper.select: -- retrieveCmplOusdCooTssExpStoa 완료 대외협력과제 비용지급 조회 SELECT A.TSS_CD as tssCd , A.TTL_CASH as ttlCash /*총액*/ , A.YY_NOS_CASH1 as yyNosCash1 /*1차현금*/ , A.YY_NOS_DT1 as yyNosDt1 /*1차지급일자*/ , (CASE WHEN C.YY_NOS_CASH1 IS NULL OR C.YY_NOS_CASH1 = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) as pgYyNosCash1Yn /*진행 1차현금입력여부*/ , A.YY_NOS_CASH2 as yyNosCash2 /*2차현금*/ , A.YY_NOS_DT2 as yyNosDt2 /*2차지급일자*/ , (CASE WHEN C.YY_NOS_CASH2 IS NULL OR C.YY_NOS_CASH2 = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) as pgYyNosCash2Yn /*진행 2차현금입력여부*/ , A.YY_NOS_CASH3 as yyNosCash3 /*3차현금*/ , A.YY_NOS_DT3 as yyNosDt3 /*3차지급일자*/ , (CASE WHEN C.YY_NOS_CASH3 IS NULL OR C.YY_NOS_CASH3 = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) as pgYyNosCash3Yn /*진행 3차현금입력여부*/ , A.YY_NOS_CASH4 as yyNosCash4 /*4차현금*/ , A.YY_NOS_DT4 as yyNosDt4 /*4차지급일자*/ , (CASE WHEN C.YY_NOS_CASH4 IS NULL OR C.YY_NOS_CASH4 = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) as pgYyNosCash4Yn /*진행 4차현금입력여부*/ , ISNULL(B.RSST_EXP,0) as rsstExp /*연구비(원)*/ , round(ISNULL(B.RSST_EXP,0) / convert(float, 100000000), 2) as rsstExpConvertMil /*연구비(억원)*/ , (ISNULL(B.RSST_EXP,0) - ISNULL(A.TTL_CASH,0)) as remainCash /*잔액*/ FROM IRIS_TSS_OUSD_EXP_STOA A /*대외협력과제비용지급*/ INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_OUSD_COO_SMRY B ON A.TSS_CD = B.TSS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_TSS_OUSD_EXP_STOA C ON C.TSS_CD = #{pgTssCd} WHERE A.TSS_CD = #{tssCd}
-- retrieveOusdCooRqEtcInfo 품의서 필요 기타정보 SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(), 23) as nowDate , ISNULL(dbo.fn_getTssPtcRsstMbrPrsnNames(#{tssCd}),'') as mbrNmList

-- retrieveOusdCooTssCmplGoalCheck 목표기술성과 조회 select case when a.arslCnt > 0 then 'N' else 'Y' end as chkYn from ( SELECT count(*) as arslCnt FROM IRIS_TSS_GOAL_ARSL /*과제목표_실적*/ WHERE TSS_CD = left(#{tssCd}, 9)+'2' and (convert(nvarchar(max), ARSL) = '' or convert(nvarchar(max), ARSL) is null) ) a
